summary: Adds crafting tables and smelters for blacksmiths who lacked the complete set.
descriptionHtml:
Made a quick mod for my own personal use but figured I might as well post it for anyone who wants to use it.

Description:
  Adds in blacksmith crafting tables and smelters for city blacksmiths who were for some reason missing them in the first place.  I found it frustrating when I went to the local blacksmith to forge a new sword only to find that I would have to fast travel back and forth just to find a smelter to melt down all of the ores i collected from my adventures, then make my way back only to find that the blacksmith didn\'t even have a grindstone to sharpen it!
  Well fret no more, as I made sure to put at least one smelter in all cities and in any towns that had a blacksmith (Riverwoood apparently is the only town that has an incomplete blacksmith).

Changes Made:
Riften 	        - Smelter
Skyforge      	- Smelter, Workbench, Tanning Rack
Dawnstar		- Workbench, Grindstone
Solitude		- Smelter
Falkreath		- Smelter
Riverwood		- Smelter

Bugs/Incompatabilities:
No bugs that I\'m aware of yet
Detailed Cities by Dex, there will be duplicate crafting tables (smelter, etc) for the Skyforge and Riverwood.
author: ClubSoda
